  • Field Details

    • id

      protected final GridItemIdentifier id
      It contains the grid item identifier.

    • configured

      protected boolean configured
      It stores the state of whether this vertex is configured or not. Therefore, this stores true if vertex is configured; otherwise, it stores false.

      The state of this variable is false by default, however, it can be changed by attribution or at construction.

  • Constructor Details

    • VertexGridItem

      protected VertexGridItem (int localId, int globalId, String name, Integer x, Integer y)
      Constructor of which specifies the local, global and name identifiers, as well as, the X and Y coordinates.
      Parameters:
      localId - the local id
      globalId - the global id
      name - the name
      x - the vertex grid item x-coordinate in cartesian coordinates
      y - the vertex grid item y-coordinate in cartesian coordinates

    • VertexGridItem

      protected VertexGridItem (int localId, int globalId, String name, Integer x, Integer y, boolean selected)
      Constructor of which specifies the local, global and name identifiers, as well as, the X and Y coordinates and whether is selected.
      Parameters:
      localId - the local id
      globalId - the global id
      name - the name
      x - the vertex grid item x-coordinate in cartesian coordinates
      y - the vertex grid item y-coordinate in cartesian coordinates
      selected - whether is selected

    • contains

      public boolean contains (int x, int y)
      Returns true if this grid item is contained at the given x-coordinate and y-coordinate (in cartesian coordinates) plus a offset. Otherwise, false is returned.
      Specified by:
      contains in interface Icon
      Parameters:
      x - the X-coordinate
      y - the Y-coordinate
      Returns:
      true if this grid item is contained at the given coordinates; otherwise false is returned.

    • getInboundConnections

      public Set<GridItem> getInboundConnections()
      Description copied from interface: GridItem
      Returns the inbound connections.

      The inbound connections are those s whose edges are incident to this grid item.

      Specified by:
      getInboundConnections in interface GridItem
      Returns:
      the inbound connections

    • getOutboundConnections

      public Set<GridItem> getOutboundConnections()
      Description copied from interface: GridItem
      Returns the outbound connections.

      The outbound connections are those s whose edges are incident from this grid item.

      Specified by:
